In late 2013, Dan Kelley started experimenting with blogging, creating a WordPress blog. Finding the WordPress data entry scheme to be somewhat arduous, and disliking commercial lock-in, he started experimenting with github blogging in early 2014, yielding entries as follows. (Readers most interested in the R items should also check out r-bloggers.)
